Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Formulation \For`mu*la"tion\, n. The act, process, or result of formulating or reducing to a formula. [1913 Webster]

formulation n 1: a substance prepared according to a formula [syn: {preparation}] 2: inventing or contriving an idea or explanation and formulating it mentally [syn: {conceptualization}, {conceptualisation}] 3: the style of expressing yourself; "he suggested a better formulation"; "his manner of expression showed how much he cared" [syn: {expression}]
